plot: When a man held captive by the military discovers his pregnant wife has also been taken, he must decide between risking his family and telling his captors what they want to hear - If he even knows what that is.
title: Captive in the Homeland
plot_es: When a man held captive by the military discovers his pregnant wife has also been taken, he must decide between risking his family and telling his captors what they want to hear - If he even knows what that is.
plot_en: When a man held captive by the military discovers his pregnant wife has also been taken, he must decide between risking his family and telling his captors what they want to hear - If he even knows what that is.
